Strong.$description: Default border color for active interface elements; used especially for selected states where background color doesn't change

Default.$description: Default border color for interface elements where user interaction happens in place

Success.$description: Alternative border color to use for successful user interaction around interface elements

Info.$description: Default border color to use for user membership interaction around interface elements
